name: Carsteroid
description:
What is it ?

"Carsteroid" is a QTE game where you control a car and need to be first at the finish line.

How much time ?

I make it in 16/18 hours because of my work, but i'm proud of the result !

Other things ?

I learn a lot somethings during the programmation in Game Maker so that was instructive. That's my first game jam and the game isn't the best but i don't regret it ! I hope you'll have fun :)
